title: John Dory with asaparagus, chilli and orange salad
description: Celebrate the flavour of John Dory by simply grilling it. Serve with a flavourful salad for a fabulous fuss-free supper.
ingredients: 2 red onions, thinly sliced using a mandoline
16 asparagus spears, woody parts removed, thinly sliced using a mandoline
4 red chillies, halved, seeds removed, thinly sliced
4 x John Dory, about 500g/1lb 2oz each, gutted, filleted and skinned
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
